Documentation is available at Html.php

  1. <?php
  2.  
  3. require_once 'Console/Color.php';
  4.  
  5. class PHPSpec_Runner_Reporter_Html extends PHPSpec_Runner_Reporter {
  6.  
  7.     protected $_headerSent = false;
  8.  
  9.     public function output($specs = false)
  10.     {
  11.         echo $this->toString($specs);
  12.     }
  13.  
  14.     /**
  15.      * Not needed for the HTML interface
  16.      * @param string $symbol 
  17.      */
  18.     public function outputStatus($symbol)
  19.     {
  20.         if (!$this->_headerSent) {
  21.             $this->renderHeader();
  22.             echo '<div id="symbols">';
  23.             $this->_headerSent = true;
  24.         }
  25.         switch ($symbol) {
  26.             case '.':
  27.                 $symbol = '<span class="passsymbol">.</span>';
  28.                 break;
  29.             case 'F':
  30.                 $symbol = '<span class="failsymbol">F</span>';
  31.                 break;
  32.             case 'E':
  33.                 $symbol = '<span class="failsymbol">E</span>';
  34.                 break;
  35.             case 'P':
  36.                 $symbol = '<span class="pendingsymbol">P</span>';
  37.                 break;
  38.             default:
  39.         }
  40.         echo $symbol;
  41.     }
  42.  
  43.     public function toString($specs = false)
  44.     {
  45.         if ($this->_headerSent) {
  46.             echo '</div>';
  47.             ob_start();
  48.         } else {
  49.             ob_start();
  50.             $this->renderHeader();
  51.         }
  52.         $this->renderSummary();
  53.         if($specs){
  54.             $this->renderSpecDocs();
  55.         }
  56.         $this->renderFailures();
  57.         $this->renderErrors();
  58.         $this->renderExceptions();
  59.         $this->renderPending();
  60.         $this->renderFooter();
  61.         return ob_get_clean();
  62.     }
  63.  
  64.     
  65.     public function __toString()
  66.     {
  67.         return $this->toString();
  68.     }
  69.  
  70.     protected function _format($description)
  71.     {
  72.         $description = preg_replace("/^describe /", '', $description);
  73.         return $description . ' ';
  74.     }
  75.  
  76.     public function getSpecdox(){        
  77.     }
  78.     
  79.     private function renderHeader(){
  80.         ?>
  81.         <html>
  82.         <head>
  83.             <title>PHPSpec Result</title>
  84.             <style type="text/css">
  85.                 body{
  86.                     font-size:0.9em;
  87.                     font-family:sans-serif;
  88.                     background-color:#e7e7e0;
  89.                 }
  90.                 h2{
  91.                     font-size:1.1em;
  92.                     text-decoration:underline;
  93.                 }
  94.                 #summary{
  95.                     font-size:1.2em;
  96.                     font-weight:bold;
  97.                 }
  98.                 #summary a{
  99.                     color:white;                
  100.                 }
  101.                 #summary.success{
  102.                     background-color:green;
  103.                     color:white;
  104.                 }
  105.                 #summary.failure{
  106.                     background-color:red;
  107.                     color:white;
  108.                 }
  109.                 #symbols,#summary,#errors,#specdoc,#failures,#exceptions,#pending{
  110.                     margin:4px;
  111.                     padding:4px;
  112.                 }
  113.                 #symbols {
  114.                     background-color: #000000;
  115.                 }
  116.                 #errors,#specdoc,#failures,#exceptions,#pending{                    
  117.                     background-color:#fffff7;
  118.                     border:1px solid #d5d4c5;
  119.                 }                                
  120.                 #errors .error{
  121.                     cursor:pointer;
  122.                 }
  123.                 div.exception .context,div.exception .spec{
  124.                     cursor:pointer;
  125.                 }
  126.                 .examples li{
  127.                     padding:1px;
  128.                 }                
  129.                 .examples .Pending .result{
  130.                     color:orange;
  131.                 }
  132.                 .examples .Fail .result, .examples .Error .result, .examples .Exception .result{
  133.                     color:red;
  134.                 }
  135.                 .spec .name{
  136.                     font-size:1.1em;
  137.                     font-weight:bold;
  138.                 }
  139.                 #specdoc .Error .example, #specdoc .Exception .example, #specdoc .Fail .example{
  140.                     cursor:pointer;
  141.                 }                                                
  142.                 .message{
  143.                     display:block;
  144.                     margin-top:4px;
  145.                     font-size:0.8em;
  146.                     white-space: pre;
  147.                 }
  148.                 .passsymbol {
  149.                     color: green;
  150.                 }
  151.                 .failsymbol {
  152.                     color: red;
  153.                 }
  154.                 .pendingsymbol {
  155.                     color: yellow;
  156.                 }
  157.             </style>            
  158.         </head>
  159.         <body>
  160.         <?php
  161.     }
  162.     
  163.     private function renderSummary(){
  164.         $failure_count = $this->_result->countFailures() + $this->_result->countDeliberateFailures();
  165.         $error_count = $this->_result->countErrors();
  166.         $exception_count = $this->_result->countExceptions();
  167.         $pending_count = $this->_result->countPending();
  168.         $class = ($error_count==0 && $exception_count ==0 && $pending_count ==0 && $failure_count==0) ? 'success' : 'failure';
  169.         ?>
  170.         <div id="summary" class="<?php echo $class; ?>">
  171.             <span class="duration">Finished in <?php echo $this->_result->getRuntime(); ?> seconds</span>    
  172.             <span class="examples">, <?php echo count($this->_result); ?> examples</span>    
  173.             <?php if ($failure_count >0 ) { ?>
  174.             <span class="failures">, <a href="#failures"><?php             
  175.             if ($failure_count == 1) {
  176.                 echo $failure_count . ' failure';
  177.             } else {
  178.                 echo $failure_count . ' failures';
  179.             }
  180.             ?></a></span>    
  181.             <?php } ?>
  182.             
  183.             <?php if ($error_count >0 ) { ?>
  184.             <span class="errors">, <a href="#errors"><?php             
  185.             if ($error_count == 1) {
  186.                 echo $error_count . ' error';
  187.             } else {
  188.                 echo $error_count . ' errors';
  189.             }
  190.             ?></a></span>    
  191.             <?php } ?>
  192.             
  193.             <?php if ($exception_count > 0) { ?>
  194.                 <span class="exceptions">,<a href="#exceptions"><?php                
  195.                 if ($exception_count == 1) {
  196.                     echo $exception_count . ' exception';
  197.                 } else {
  198.                     echo $exception_count . ' exceptions';
  199.                 }
  200.                 ?></a></span><?php
  201.             }?>
  202.             <?php if ($pending_count > 0) { ?>
  203.             <span class="pending">, <a href="#pending"><?php echo $pending_count; ?> pending</a></span>
  204.             <?php } ?>            
  205.         </div>
  206.         <?php
  207.     }
  208.  
  209.  
  210.     private function renderFailures(){
  211.         if ($this->_result->countFailures() > 0 || $this->_result->countDeliberateFailures() > 0) {
  212.         ?>
  213.         <div id="failures">
  214.             <h2>Failures</h2>
  215.             <?php            
  216.             $failed = $this->_result->getTypes('fail');
  217.             foreach ($failed as $failure) {
  218.                 ?>
  219.                 <div class="failure">
  220.                     <span class="context"><?php echo $this->_format($failure->getContextDescription()); ?></span>
  221.                     <span class="spec"><?php echo $failure->getSpecificationText(); ?> FAILED</span>
  222.                     <code class="message"><?php echo $failure->getFailedMessage(); ?></code>                    
  223.                 </div>
  224.                 <?php                
  225.             }?>
  226.             <?php            
  227.             $failed = $this->_result->getTypes('deliberateFail');
  228.             foreach ($failed as $failure) {
  229.                 ?>
  230.                 <div class="failure">
  231.                     <span class="context"><?php echo $this->_format($failure->getContextDescription()); ?></span>
  232.                     <span class="spec"><?php echo $failure->getSpecificationText(); ?> FAILED</span>
  233.                     <code class="message"><?php echo $failure->getMessage(); ?></code>                    
  234.                 </div>
  235.                 <?php                
  236.             }?>
  237.         </div>
  238.         <?php
  239.         }
  240.     }
  241.  
  242.     private function renderErrors(){
  243.         if ($this->_result->countErrors() > 0) {
  244.         ?>
  245.         <div id="errors">
  246.             <h2>Errors</h2>
  247.             <?php            
  248.             $errors = $this->_result->getTypes('error');
  249.             foreach ($errors as $error) {
  250.                 ?>
  251.                 <div class="error">
  252.                     <span class="context"><?php echo $this->_format($error->getContextDescription()); ?></span>
  253.                     <span class="spec"><?php echo $error->getSpecificationText(); ?> ERROR</span>
  254.                     <code class="message"><?php echo $error->toString(); ?></code>                    
  255.                 </div>
  256.                 <?php                
  257.             }?>            
  258.         </div>
  259.         <?php
  260.         }
  261.     }
  262.  
  263.     private function renderExceptions(){
  264.         if ($this->_result->countExceptions() > 0) {
  265.         ?>
  266.         <div id="exceptions">
  267.             <h2>Exceptions</h2>
  268.             <?php            
  269.             $exceptions = $this->_result->getTypes('exception');
  270.             foreach ($exceptions as $exception) {
  271.                 ?>
  272.                 <div class="exception">
  273.                     <span class="context"><?php echo $this->_format($exception->getContextDescription()); ?></span>
  274.                     <span class="spec"><?php echo $exception->getSpecificationText(); ?> EXCEPTION</span>
  275.                     <code class="message"><?php echo $exception->toString(); ?></code>                    
  276.                 </div>
  277.                 <?php                
  278.             }?>            
  279.         </div>
  280.         <?php
  281.         }
  282.     }
  283.  
  284.     private function renderPending(){
  285.         if ($this->_result->countPending() > 0) {
  286.         ?>
  287.         <div id="pending">
  288.             <h2>Pending</h2>
  289.             <?php            
  290.             $pendings = $this->_result->getTypes('pending');
  291.             foreach ($pendings as $pending) {
  292.                 ?>
  293.                 <div class="exception">
  294.                     <span class="context"><?php echo $this->_format($pending->getContextDescription()); ?></span>
  295.                     <span class="spec"><?php echo $pending->getSpecificationText(); ?> PENDING</span>
  296.                     <code class="message"><?php echo $pending->getMessage(); ?></code>                    
  297.                 </div>
  298.                 <?php                
  299.             }?>            
  300.         </div>
  301.         <?php
  302.         }
  303.     }
  304.  
  305.     function renderSpecDocs(){
  306.  
  307.         $examples = $this->_result->getExamples();
  308.         $contexts = array();
  309.         foreach ($examples as $example) {
  310.             if (!isset($contexts[$example->getContextDescription()])) {
  311.                 $contexts[$example->getContextDescription()] = array();
  312.             }
  313.             $contexts[$example->getContextDescription()][] = $example;
  314.         }
  315.         ?>
  316.         <div id="specdoc">
  317.         <h2>Specifications</h2>
  318.         <?php
  319.         foreach ($contexts as $description=>$arrayOfExamples) {
  320.             ?>
  321.             <div class="spec">
  322.                 <span class="name"><?php echo $this->_format($description); ?></span>
  323.                 <span class="examples">
  324.                 <ul>
  325.                 <?php
  326.                 foreach($arrayOfExamples as $example) {                    
  327.                     $class = get_class($example);
  328.                     $parts = explode('_', $class);
  329.                     $type = array_pop($parts);                    
  330.                     ?>
  331.                     <li class="<?php echo $type; ?>">
  332.                         <span class="example"><?php echo $example->getSpecificationText(); ?>                            
  333.                         </span>                                                      
  334.                         <?php if($type !='Pass'){ ?>
  335.                             <span class="result"><?php echo strtoupper($type); ?></span>                                
  336.                         <?php } ?>
  337.                          <?php
  338.                          switch ($type) {
  339.                              case 'Fail':
  340.                                  ?><code class="message"><?php echo $example->getFailedMessage(); ?></code><?php
  341.                                  break;
  342.  
  343.                              case 'Error':
  344.                              case 'Exception':
  345.                                  ?><code class="message"><?php echo $example->getException(); ?></code><?php
  346.                              default:
  347.                                  break;
  348.                          }?>                             
  349.                     </li>
  350.                     <?php    
  351.                 }?>
  352.                 </ul>
  353.                 </span>
  354.             </div>
  355.             <?php            
  356.         }
  357.         ?>            
  358.         </div>
  359.         <?php
  360.     }
  361.  
  362.     private function renderFooter(){
  363.         ?>
  364.         <script type="text/javascript">
  365.         
  366.         // make all code tags under the given container id hidden by default, and toggleable by clicking on example name.
  367.         function initCodeBlocks(id){
  368.             var div = document.getElementById(id);
  369.             if(div){
  370.                 var error_messages = div.getElementsByTagName('code');
  371.                 for(var i=0; i<error_messages.length; i++){
  372.                     error_messages[i].style.display='none';
  373.                 }
  374.                 var errors = div.getElementsByTagName('div');
  375.                 for(var i=0; i<errors.length; i++){
  376.                     var spans = errors[i].getElementsByTagName('span');
  377.                     for(var j=0; j<spans.length; j++){
  378.                         if(spans[j].getAttribute('class')=='context' || spans[j].getAttribute('class')=='spec'){
  379.                             spans[j].onclick = function(){
  380.  
  381.                                 var error_messages = this.parentNode.getElementsByTagName('code');
  382.                                 for(var m=0; m<error_messages.length; m++){
  383.                                     if(error_messages[m].style.display=='none'){
  384.                                         error_messages[m].style.display='block';
  385.                                     }else{
  386.                                         error_messages[m].style.display='none';
  387.                                     }
  388.                                 }
  389.  
  390.                             }
  391.                         }
  392.                     }
  393.                 }
  394.             }
  395.         }
  396.  
  397.         // make specdoc code blocks hidden by default, and toggleable by clicking on example name. 
  398.         var specdoc_div = document.getElementById('specdoc');
  399.         if(specdoc_div){
  400.             var error_messages = specdoc_div.getElementsByTagName('code');
  401.             for(var i=0; i<error_messages.length; i++){
  402.                 error_messages[i].style.display='none';
  403.             }
  404.             var li = specdoc_div.getElementsByTagName('li');
  405.             for(var i=0; i<li.length; i++){
  406.                 if(li[i].getAttribute('class')=='Fail' || li[i].getAttribute('class')=='Error' || li[i].getAttribute('class')=='Exception'){
  407.                     var spans = li[i].getElementsByTagName('span');
  408.                     for(var k=0; k<spans.length; k++){
  409.                         spans[k].onclick = function(){
  410.                             var error_messages = this.parentNode.getElementsByTagName('code');
  411.                             for(var j=0; j<error_messages.length; j++){
  412.                                 if(error_messages[j].style.display=='none'){
  413.                                     error_messages[j].style.display='block';
  414.                                 }else{
  415.                                     error_messages[j].style.display='none';
  416.                                 }
  417.                             }
  418.                         }
  419.                     }
  420.                 }
  421.             }
  422.         }
  423.  
  424.         initCodeBlocks('errors');
  425.         initCodeBlocks('exceptions');
  426.         </script>
  427.         </body>
  428.         </html>
  429.         <?php
  430.     }
  431.  
  432. }

Documentation generated on Wed, 09 Jan 2008 16:01:59 +0000 by phpDocumentor 1.4.1
